data.text: @MichaelDNicola @DianneRock @CanBorder @GovCanHealth Exactly. Zero help but Canada’s leaders are bragging they made some significant change. Just shows how our of they have been and remain out of touch. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @manvirshokar @CPHO_Canada @JustinTrudeau @GovCanHealth

@DianneRock @CanBorder @GovCanHealth I live 30 minutes from the US/Canada border and the 24hr limit set on the rapid test is STILL not long enough.  Like you I'm forced to get the more expensive PCR test.

So I ask again, what was the point of these "eased" restrictions? They've helped nobody.
@MichaelDNicola @CanBorder @GovCanHealth I still need the pcr test because there is no way I could drive from Florida after test in 24 hrs

@MichaelDNicola @CanBorder @GovCanHealth Our leaders are tone deaf and simply can’t read the room. They think the changes actually helped cross border families that have paid a heavy toll for 2 years. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @manvirshokar @JustinTrudeau @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth
@BRADYJG1 @CanBorder @GovCanHealth The science currently doesn’t fit the agenda. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @manvirshokar @JustinTrudeau @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth

@djchinatown @CanBorder Testing for short trips is useless. It is not a protection. Science dictates that. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @manvirshokar @JustinTrudeau @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth

@CanBorder Wake up, Sean Fraser! Make IRCC process TR2PR applications IN ORDER! Pls first come first served! It’s Canadian common value! It’s unfair that fews people submit before 65 minutes got No AOR, while others submitting after 1500minutes got. No AOR after 9 month?
